reference.title: MME support for adding s1hoResourceReleaseWithNoMmeSgwRel timer (Feature f10568-01): feature summary
reference.shortdesc: This feature supports a new timer s1hoResourceReleaseWithNoMmeSgwRel instead of existing s1hoResourceRelease timer, which is used to guard in intra-MME and intra-S-GW HO scenarios to initiate release towards the source eNB. This feature also supports increase in the resolution of the MME and the AMF timers from 100 milliseconds to 50 milliseconds.

table.title: MME support for adding s1hoResourceReleaseWithNoMmeSgwRel timer: feature summary
